constitutionalAuthorityStatementText:
[Congressional Record Volume 167, Number 208 (Thursday, December 2, 2021)]
[House]
From the Congressional Record Online through the Government Publishing Office [www.gpo.gov]
By Mr. DAVID SCOTT of Georgia:
H.R. 6137.
Congress has the power to enact this legislation pursuant
to the following:
to lay and collect Taxes, Duties, Imposts, and Excises, to
pay the Debts, and provide for the common Defense and general
Welfare of the United States; but all Duties, Imposts and
Excises shall be uniform throughout the United States.
[Page H6910]

latestAction.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Research and Technology.

title: MAKERS Act
